subject: Soccer
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Jermain Defoe scored in the 23rd minute as England advanced from Group C; Slovenia was eliminated when a late goal lifted the United States to the top of the group standings.
snippet: Jermain Defoe scored in the 23rd minute as England advanced from Group C; Slovenia was eliminated when a late goal lifted the United States to the top of the group standings.
